DataElement.preferredName: Complete Remission Post First-Line Therapy Confirmation Ind-4
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator for eligibility with values of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable for the disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Complete Remission Post First-Line Therapy Confirmed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to verificiation of the disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment after the preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured.

Concepts.definition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.:Confirmed; having been established or verified.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the complete response to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the complete response to front-line chemotherapy include a negative physical exam, normalization of CA-125 if elevated at baseline, and negative radiographic assessment of disease, if obtained?

ReferenceDocuments.name: GOG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a complete response to front-line platinum-taxane therapy (at least three cycles and may have included a biologic, like bevacizumab) and a treatment-free interval without clinical evidence of progressive disease lasting at least 6 months following completion of front-line platinum-taxane therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have complete response and have disease progression/relapse with treatment-free interval of 12 months or more from last dose of therapy with immune check inhibition?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-4 2774784v1 with VD ID#3506035 - Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator - dbw Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013
